channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Counter Box – WordPress plugin for countdown, timer, counter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Counter Box – WordPress plugin for countdown, timer, counter

item.title: CVE-2022-2245|2024-08-03T00:32:09.532Z -- unknown -- counter%20box%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20%20plugin%20for%20countdown%2C%20timer%2C%20counter
item.description: The Counter Box WordPress plugin before 1.2.1 is lacking CSRF check when activating and deactivating counters, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin perform such actions via CSRF attacks
